name: Sky Climbers: Rise of The Hero
detailed_description:
Jump into the vast world of Lithan where the people are accustomed to traveling among the high mountain ridges. Your agility will prove useful when navigating the world as you sprint up fallen trees before descending onto the rocks below. In order to survive you will need to master vital skills such as woodcutting, crafting, and hunting and thankfully you are not alone.

Your family and neighbors will accompany you in your hometown Hestforth, each providing a service for you to learn or benefit from. Currently we have fully integrated three characters will their own lines of interaction while the rest are still in development.

short_description: Explore the vast forests of Lithan on a hunting expedition before returning to your campsite at night. Climb to the highest peak to enjoy the vistas and serene soundtrack. Play as an unknown hero before rising to power in this ambitious truly open world experience that has been carefully crafted for VR.
